EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Registrants - Hotel Booking Reminder 11-8-1
EmailTemplate.subject: Book Your SpringOne Platform Travel by November 15
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SpringOne Platform is just around the corner and we want you to be prepared. Start planning now to attend the conference, where you will have opportunities to connect, collaborate, and learn from fellow members of the Spring and cloud-native communities.
Book Your Travel by November 15: If you haven’t already, check out the travel page <[[https://springoneplatform.io/travel?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> on the SpringOne Platform website. There you will find the Park Central Hotel with discounted rates, public and private transportation, parking information, registration check-in times, and more.
Discounted hotel rooms are limited and have filled up quickly. Login <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration/edit?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-hotel-q317]]> to your SpringOne Platform account to book your hotel room today!
Stay Connected: Join the conversation on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]>, using the hashtags #S1P and #SpringOne, and follow @s1p <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> for news and updates.
We look forward to seeing you in December!
The SpringOne Platform Team
